tests.name: Question 1: Negative number
tests.run: echo "-3 0 38.3 true 48 94.9 83.8 B 2 14" | java HW_WarmUp | grep "The number is negative." | wc -l

tests.name: Question 1: Non-negative number
tests.run: echo "1 0 38.3 true 48 94.9 83.8 B 2 14" | java HW_WarmUp | grep "The number is negative." | wc -l
